title: Better job training improves human capital

content.question: Increases in human capital can be achieved by which of the following?

choices.label: Improving the quality of job-training programs
Increasing the physical capital per worker

content.answer: Improving the quality of job-training programs

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
